programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: Ngayon At Kailanman
programme.desc: Eva fights to reclaim her place in the wealthy Cortes family while searching for the truth about her identity. Fate brings her together with Inno, and their love story endures family secrets, rivalry and tragedy as they discover the real meaning of forgiveness and redemption.

programme.title: Lavender Fields
programme.desc: The life of a simple flower farm girl is shattered when she falls for a charming accountant, who turns out to be a married gun cartel member. Targeted for his stolen money, she loses everything she holds dear and reinvents herself to seek justice.

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo
programme.desc: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighbourhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

programme.title: Roja
programme.desc: A paradise like no other - La Playa Roja is your ultimate escape! But behind its beauty lies danger, and soon, you'll see RED. Are you ready for the fight to survive?

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: The lives of four individuals are turned upside down after they witness the murder of their friend. They band together to put the alleged killer behind bars, but years later, the imprisoned man seeks revenge, unraveling dark secrets that test their loyalty and survival.

programme.title: Pamilya Sagrado
programme.desc: Being a prominent political clan, the Sagrados want nothing but to keep their name faultless and sacred, until a controversial incident comes their way.

programme.title: TV Patrol Global Edition
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: Ang Larawan
programme.desc: Ang Larawan tells the story of two sisters struggling to make ends meet after their painter father falls ill and fails to produce art.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa ep 31
programme.desc:
This is a story of revenge by Norman Dela Cruz, a 
loving son, and he aspires to become a lawyer for 
the underprivileged. After his mother was killed, he 
vowed to seek revenge against the influential 
retired judge, Benito Balmores.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa ep 32
programme.desc:
This is a story of revenge by Norman Dela Cruz, a 
loving son, and he aspires to become a lawyer for 
the underprivileged. After his mother was killed, he 
vowed to seek revenge against the influential 
retired judge, Benito Balmores.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 65
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 210
programme.desc: The series is based on the graphic novel created by Carlo J. Caparas. Totoy Bato, a young man, fighting for justice for his lost loved ones; also fighting for equality and fairness against his old friend turned nemesis Dwayne.

programme.title: Beh Buti Nga ep 12
programme.desc: After making a fortune from Bitcoin, Axel gets back at the girls who once broke his heart. When he succeeds, he makes it a mission to help his high school barkada to become confident heartbreakers. However, things take a turn when Isabelle their only female friend in high school starts forming a bond with Axel and he falls in love with her for real.

programme.title: Team A S1 ep 8
programme.desc: Janet and Ian started a simple life together, but will their maried life be as happy as they dreamed to be when both their parents treat each other as enemy?

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 24
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Osyana ep 6
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 10
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.desc: Alex becomes a famous makeup artist because of her mother’s unique brush set but will face a challenge when all her clients begin to die, one by one.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: House Of Lies
programme.desc: House of Lies is an intense, family-centered drama about two mothers who face off against each other. Shaped by painful pasts, they clash in a fierce battle marked by betrayal, hidden family secrets, and a fight for survival.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Never Say Die
programme.desc: Never Say Die follows Joey Delgado (Jillian Ward), a principled IT student who runs a vlog spotlighting the quiet heroism of honest police officers-inspired by her father, Major Julio Delgado (Raymart Santiago). programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes

programme.desc: The latest multi-platform showbiz news and talk show on Kapuso network.

programme.desc: Gives an up-to-the minute news here and around the world.

programme.title: Pbb Celebrity Collab Edition 2.0
programme.desc: The TV reality competition follows the same premise as its many foreign counterparts around the world wherein a number of Filipinos volunteered to live inside a house for a certain number of days.

programme.title: Saksi
programme.desc: Brings up-to-the-minute news, relentlessly delivering breaking stories and covering live reports.

programme.title: Unang Hirit
programme.desc: A news magazine show that offers humor and information from hard news to special interests segments on travel, health, housekeeping and entertainment.

programme.title: I
programme.desc: A documentary on the different issues in society hosted by a set of trusted broadcast journalists in the country

programme.title: Tadhana
programme.desc: An Overseas Filipino Workers themed weekly anthology that will dramatize the colorful, romantic, heroic, and inspiring stories of OFWs.

programme.title: Regal Studio Presents
programme.desc: A collection of weekly specials which feature timely, feel-good stories.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: House Of Lies
programme.desc: House of Lies is an intense, family-centered drama about two mothers who face off against each other. Shaped by painful pasts, they clash in a fierce battle marked by betrayal, hidden family secrets, and a fight for survival.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Where 'D' Girls 'R'
programme.desc: Rapper-comedian Andrew E and the kids from the hit TV series TGIS combined together in this merry mix-up about poor boys falling in love with rich girls, who were guarded by a very strict maiden aunt.

programme.title: Bitag (Babae At Bala)
programme.desc: Sgt. Nick Nobleza (Jestoni Alarcon) is the straightest cop in the police force. He is assigned to infiltrate the drug syndicate of Mr. Villafuerte. But Mr. Villafuerte is one step ahead as he sets up a trap of his own.

programme.title: Tatlo Silang Tatay Ko
programme.desc: Siamese triplets Brando, Butch and Bronson (TVJ) are forced to take in the newly-orphaned Nitoy (Niño Muhlach). The journey from downright hostility to tolerance to acceptance and finally to filial love is a fun adventure guaranteed to amuse everybody.

programme.title: Manalo Matalo, Mahal Kita
programme.desc: Mikee played the girl selling lotto tickets. Cesar spent his last ten pesos on a ticket hoping to win the jackpot. The two had some fights, which eventually fade off as both fell in love with each other.

programme.title: Working Girls 2 (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Working Girls 2 is a funny yet insightful look into the lives of women trying to make a go of their chosen careers despite the prejudices encountered by the female gender. Viewers are sure to identify with any of the characters as the experiences of working women are well represented here.

programme.title: Hanggang Ngayo'y Ika'y Minamahal
programme.desc: She loves her husband despite his irresponsible ways.She continues to stand by him despite his flaws.

programme.title: Akyat Bahay Gang
programme.desc: Lito Lapid was working in a carnival. He learned to do many things to meet both ends. He was a good man but circumstances tried to direct him on the wrong path.

programme.title: Maging Sino Ka Man (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Together in a remote barrio, Sharon and Robin discovered love and the children found themselves a home. But first they must settle the matter of her money-hungry relatives and Robin must learn to accept Sharon's real self.

programme.title: Bikini Watch (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: It's a wild and funny tale of action and romance as they encountered a mischievous group of hunks who were out to destroy the beach.

programme.title: Kadenang Bulaklak
programme.desc: Three little girls were given up for adoption after their parents were killed in an accident. Vina, the oldest sister, was left behind with an aunt. She vowed that one day, she would find all her sisters and reunite her family.

programme.title: Carding Estrabel: Tirador Ng Malabon
programme.desc: One of the heroes that emerged during the Japanese occupation was the soldier-killer Carding (Dante Varona). After the war, Carding became a policeman and as such, continued his work of ridding the force of its corrupt elements.

programme.title: Marami Ka Pang Kakaining Bigas
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia played a veteran cop who rose from the ranks and who survived by his wits. Joko Diaz, on the other hand, was a young graduate from the police academy who did everything by the book.

programme.title: Hindi Ako Ander (Itanong Mo Kay Kumander)
programme.desc: Real-life husband and wife, Janno Gibbs and Bing Loyzaga, took their talented daughter, Allyssa, through her paces in her first film appearance. Janno was jobless husband forced to keep house.

programme.title: Kapitan Tumba
programme.desc: Roi Vinzon attained full stardom in Kapitan Tumba, the true-to-life controversial story of Capt. Jose Huevos of Bulacan.

programme.title: The Untouchable Family
programme.desc: Ma Barker and sons Mad Max, Machinegun Nonong and Pretty Boy Fredo want to be the number one criminal family in the land.

programme.title: Nag-Iisang Ikaw
programme.desc: Cissy (Mikee Cojuangco) started to doubt if Albert (Matthew Mendoza) was the right man for her. While working for a fashion magazine, she met a photographer, Aaron (Keempee De Leon).

programme.title: Friends In Love (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Set in the sprawling campus of Brent School in scenic Baguio City, young stars Sharon, William, Jackie Lou and Rowell played a game of romantic musical chairs in this heartwarming story. Opposites attract and they were all faced with the difficulty of adjusting to the differences in their personalities.

programme.title: Itanong Mo Sa Buwan
programme.desc: Josie is not really a victim but Angelito's lover. He then declares they planned the whole thing to finance a new life together. Who is telling the truth?

programme.title: Bakit Bughaw Ang Langit?
programme.desc: Why is the sky blue? Why do we love the people we love? These are questions no one can answer. Because is just is.

programme.title: Kasalanan Bang Sambahin Ka
programme.desc: As a last fling before getting married, Alex (Julio Diaz) dates his friend's cousin Catherine (Vivian Velez). When Alex still marries his fiancee Grace (Dawn Zulueta), Catherine makes life difficult by creating a scandal.

programme.title: Love At First Sight
programme.desc: Three childhood friends discover their worth and inner strengths, as they experience love and being loved.

programme.title: Sinasamba Kita (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Lorna, the illegitimate daughter of a business tycoon was left in the care of her half-sister, Vilma, upon the death of their father. Though she took care of all her material needs, she refused to show the girl any kind of affection.

programme.title: Jesus Calderon (Maton)
programme.desc: This is another take-off on the eternal poor boy loves rich girl tale. Love wins out in the end but only after Jesus Calderon has proven himself, and the lovely damsel in distress has learned to love and trust him with all her heart.

programme.title: Duplikado
programme.desc: One look. Two people. One name. Two destinies. Fate separated them on the very day they were born.
